    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_78498</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Hydrogen cycle: Nuclear fusion of  two helium-3 nuclei</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasserstoffschleife: Kernfusion von zwei 
Kernen helium-3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cycle d'hydrogène : Fusion nucléaire de 
deux noyaux helium-3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciclo do hidrogênio: Fusão nuclear de dois
núcleos helium-3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciclo dell'idrogeno: Una fusione nucleare di
due nuclei helium-3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κύκλος υδρογόνου: Πυρηνική τήξη δύο ήλιο-3 
πυρήνων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciclo del hidrógeno: Fusión nuclear de 
dos núcleos helium-3</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Third of a series of three steps in the hydrogen or proton-proton cycle, which shows nuclear fusion of two helium-3 nuclei producing a helium-4 nucleus, two hydrogen-1 nuclei and a pulse of gamma-radiation.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cycle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">deuterium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gamma-radiations</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">helium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nuclear fusion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nuclei</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Protons</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Third einer Reihe von drei Jobsteps in der 
Wasserstoff- oder Proton-Protonschleife, die Kernfusion von zwei 
Kernen helium-3 zeigt, einen Kern helium-4 produzierend, zwei Kerne 
hydrogen-1 und ein Impuls der Gamma-Strahlung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tiers d'une série de trois étapes dans le cycle
d'hydrogène ou de proton-proton, qui montre la fusion nucléaire de 
deux noyaux helium-3 produisant un noyau helium-4, deux noyaux 
hydrogen-1 et une impulsion de gamma-rayonnement.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Third de uma série de três etapas no ciclo do 
hidrogênio ou do proton-proton-proton, que mostra uma fusão nuclear 
de dois núcleos helium-3 produzindo um núcleo helium-4, dois 
núcleos hydrogen-1 e um pulso da gamma-radiação.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Terzo di una serie di tre punti nel ciclo del 
protone-protone o dell'idrogeno, che mostra una fusione nucleare di 
due nuclei helium-3 producendo un nucleo helium-4, due nuclei 
hydrogen-1 e un impulso di gamma-radiazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τρίτο μιας σειράς τριών βημάτων στον κύκλο υδρογόνου
ή πρωτόνιο-πρωτονίων, που εμφανίζει πυρηνική τήξη δύο ήλιο-3 
πυρήνων παράγοντας έναν ήλιο-4 πυρήνα, δύο πυρήνων υδρογόνο-1 
και ενός σφυγμού της γάμμα-ακτινοβολίας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tercero de una serie de tres pasos de progresión
en el ciclo del hidrógeno o del proto'n-proto'n, que muestra la 
fusión nuclear de dos núcleos helium-3 produciendo un núcleo 
helium-4, dos núcleos hydrogen-1 y un pulso de la gamma-radiacio'n.</string>
          </description>
